DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluates the prostate-specific antigen (PSA) response in HLA-A*02 positive patients with biochemical recurrence after radical prostatectomy treated with a prostate-specific peptide vaccine in combination with different immune-adjuvants.
DOC.brief_title: Peptide-specific Vaccination in HLA-A*02 Positive Patients With Biochemical Recurrence After Radical Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with a biochemical recurrence after initial therapy can be included.
